solution_line_template: If the zoo would decide to import {new_species_imported} new species, there would be {initial_species} + {new_species_imported} = <<{initial_species}+{new_species_imported}={total_species}>>{total_species} species in total.
This would mean, that seeing each type of animal would take {total_species} * {time_per_animal_type} = <<{total_species}*{time_per_animal_type}={total_time_minutes}>>{total_time_minutes} minutes.
